71c1ddf5-e090-4ca9-bb56-12954fd20d1b.description: Students demonstrating leadership through opportunities available at Bangor High School.
71c1ddf5-e090-4ca9-bb56-12954fd20d1b.name: Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrates: Ability to verbally communicate with persons inside the group, represent their initiatives to outside individuals and groups, speak effectively in large or small groups, develop and facilitate thoughtful presentations, ability to plan, organize, and meet deadlines, ability to track the progress of multiple individuals who are responsible for goals, ability to establish priorities, ability to motivate a group to meet short and long term goals, ability to work in a team structure.

skills.name: Ability To Recognise And Develop One's Own Leadership Style
Ability To Work In A Team
Activities/Programs Aligning With Organization's Goals And Objectives
Can Convey Ideas In Oral Communication

882a6b04-fe5f-4495-8667-fc805a4ed053.description: The Visual & Performing Arts Academy offers three pathways: Visual Art, Theater Arts, and Music. Each program combines outstanding curriculum with the expectation that students apply and enrich their learning with committed study of content and skill throughout the academic year and during the summer. By design, academy learning experiences meaningfully extend the curriculum, deliberately accelerate student learning, progressively contribute to the development of a distinguished portfolio.
882a6b04-fe5f-4495-8667-fc805a4ed053.name: VPA Academy - Visual Art Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Seven (7) total courses are required in each pathway concentration, all of which are instructed and assessed at the Honors or Advanced Placement (AP) Level and all of which must culminate with the AP course corresponding to the area of study. Each pathway concentration ends with its respective Advanced Placement course that is designed to facilitate completion a Capstone Project. The Capstone is a four-year culmination of student work in the pathway presented in portfolio form.

skills.name: Basics Of Typography And Color Theory
Visual Design, Design Principles, Color Theory, Iconography, Typography, Branding

f4e25c16-79d3-4471-8236-01f2d1ffc559.description: The Visual & Performing Arts Academy offers three pathways: Visual Art, Theater Arts, and Music. Each program combines outstanding curriculum with the expectation that students apply and enrich their learning with committed study of content and skill throughout the academic year and during the summer. By design, academy learning experiences meaningfully extend the curriculum, deliberately accelerate student learning, progressively contribute to the development of a distinguished portfolio.
f4e25c16-79d3-4471-8236-01f2d1ffc559.name: VPA Academy - Theatre Art Completion

badge_template_activities.title: After three years of intense curricular work in theatre design classes, and additional art electives, students complete their fourth year in a seminar class focused on the analysis and synthesis of dramatic expression, thematic content, historical context, technical application and production design that informs and inspires three collaborative capstone opportunities

skills.name: Ability To Work In A Team
